title: Wow, Divinity: OS is really fun with all the EE changes
body:
If you liked it original and haven't played the enhanced edition yet, it's definitely worth another play through. They also have a harder mode for people that want more challenge.

I'm making it my goal atm to finish a duo Lone Wolves run on Honour Mode (it's the harder difficulty, but if your party wipes once you lose your save). About to start my 3rd attempt soon.
